Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at 111th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 111th, Kedzie, 107th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 111th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 111th, Kedzie, 107th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 111th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Jackson
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Madison, Laramie, Jackson and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Madison, Laramie, Jackson and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Western
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses temp. rerouted WB: 111th, Ashland, 115th and Marshfield; EB: 115th, Ashland and 111th due to, street blockage near 111th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due tostreet blockage near 111th/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via 111th, Ashland, 115th and Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 115th, Ashland and 111th.

Allow extra travel time.
